PERSONAL DETAILS

Strategies for driving business success in the new digital economy
MBA – Major: Marketing (2003-05) 1st Class, BIMM Pune, India
Summer internship with Eli Lilly a leading pharmaceutical Fortune 200 company for research project on measuring effectiveness of marketing strategies in Indian market in Nov ‘2004
B.E, Electrical Engineering (1999 – 2003) 1st Class, Nagpur University, India
Won Second prize in national level paper presentation contest “Spandan-2003” for paper titled “Biomass as a nonconventional source of energy” in FY 2003
Paper titled “Virtual Reality – A tool in Bio mechatronics” was selected in IEEE students meet at Hyderabad in FY 2003
CAREER SUMMARY
Sept 2015 to date Wacker Chemicals
Oct 2017 to date
Position: Regional Sales Manager – Middle East & Africa
Responsible for creating business plan, achieving overall revenue, profitability and growth targets at Wacker Silicones for coating and construction segments in Middle East and Africa region
New business development activities through launch of new products and geographical expansion
Create market development plan to deliver key marketing and product initiatives
Distributor’s sales team training & management, Key account management for designated accounts
Sept 2015 to Oct 2017
Position: Sales Manager – Africa
Defined and implemented distribution landscape for Wacker label sealants to 7 new African countries
Generated $ 2 million additional business for sealants product range in Africa region with geographical expansion
Managed Sales support & business development activities such as Demand forecasting, distributor sales team training, product trial & approvals, product application through technical centre, define channel pricing
Mar 2010 to Sept 2015 Huntsman
Apr 2012 to Sept 2015
Position: Product Manager – India, MEA and Turkey (IMT Region) / Distribution Sales Manager – Middle East and Africa
Product Manager Role Deliverables:
Successfully managed sales revenue of $ 80 million per annum from sales and product portfolio management
Responsible to work with leading consultancy firm McKinsey to implement major business transformation project for Huntsman Advanced Materials business in FY 2012, achieved EBITDA improvement by 30 %
Drive projects for both customers and products portfolios to increase regional EBITDA
Managed team of 4 in Product management function
Distribution Sales Manager Role Deliverables:
Delivered Core Business Growth of 33 % from FY 2012 to FY 2014 in adhesives segment
Evaluated and implemented distribution consolidation project with new service levels for Middle East and Africa in FY 2014 to improve the channel efficacy
Meet business targets and deliver key marketing and product initiatives, work on profitability improvement projects
Define and implement distribution landscape for Middle East and Africa. Evaluate existing and appoint new distributors to deliver targeted growth
Mar 2010 to Apr 2012
Position: Business Development Manager – Adhesives – Middle East and Africa
Achieve revenue and profitability targets for DIY(Consumer) & Industrial adhesive category
Channel management for Middle East and Africa region, managed 12 distributors and 30 direct accounts
New product launch in consumer segment, Introduced 5 new products in Middle East
Responsible for promotional activities and geographical expansion for brand Araldite
May 2008 to Mar 2010 Payback (American Express Co.)
Position: Product Manager: Loyalty Programs & CRM
Part of the i-mint start-up team, conceptualized and implemented of loyalty & CRM programs across industries
Launched premium rewards program for Indian market in FY 2009
Formulated & implemented strategies to improve members experience in the program
Responsible for marketing research, competition mapping and product pricing
Dec 2005

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
